Frequency once per hour

Requirements You must know the target's name.

In a moment of inspiration, you understand the target perfectly, allowing you to craft a rune that draws effects to the target by their very name. Attempt a @Check[crafting] check against a standard DC of the target creature's level. Regardless of the outcome, you cannot attempt to use By Your Name against the target again for 24 hours.

Critical Success You understand the target's true name, which you add temporarily to your runic repertoire as a special diacritic rune. This diacritic rune magnifies the effects of the base rune when targeting the creature whose true name the rune represents. When invoked, the target takes a –2 circumstance penalty on their saving throw against the effects of the base rune. Additionally, if the base rune deals damage, it gains a status bonus to its damage equal to half your level. The inspiration used to understand this diacritic rune fades quickly, and you forget how to use the diacritic rune after 1 minute.

Success As critical success, but a –1 penalty and the rune doesn't magnify damage.
